p: Endophytic actinomycetes are organisms that colonize internal plant tissues without any symptoms of diseases [ 13, 14]. Endophytic actinobacteria, especially Streptomyces spp., have the ability to secrete different secondary metabolites, which are used as a biocatalysts to fabricate metal and metal oxide NPs such as Cu-NPs, CuO-NPs, Ag-NPs, and Au-NPs [ 15, 16, 17, 18].
